comments.comment:
I'm from muhudu maha vihara area. This place was found and protected  by muslims. Even during the civil war when not even a monk there to look after the archeological place we were there.  The monks who were maintaining this place before Tsunami was very humble and caring with nearby Muslim community. After Tsunami only all the NGOs came there and found this place meanwhile they also found that there is not a single Buddhist family nearby the Vihara. Only after this systematic approach is being done to occupy lands around this temple. Most of my childhood time spent inside the vihara area so that I have very close sentiment with the place. Now the monks and the army officers are not allowing muslims to go inside moreover they are claiming 70 or so acre lands around the temple this claim directly questioning our living.
Our budhist brothers you have religious connection with the temple whereas we have more then that in my view because this is our home.
comments.author: NEW HOPE

replies.replyComment: There are Buddhist families in Panama,  Pothuwil but may not close to Muhudu Mahaweharaya, that  doesn't mean it is neglected. All Culutural heritage in Sri Lanka were abandoned during the colonial period from 12 AD to 18 AD, so what you see in Dambulla, Sigiriya' etc all touristic places renovated after 1850, So it has abondoned  more than 600 years but it still well funtioning. Muhudu Maha vihara and Panama etc left Sinhalesse becouse of War, Buddhist monks killed by LTTE but after ending war, many people want to come..If land were taken by Muslims belong to temple or archological sites, it must be given to its rigt owners ...This temple goes 2BC if people do noy study they do not believe . But it happen. Tourists want to save elephants, make country clean, respect temples, well behave in temple. If Tourists do, then Muslims also need to protect thise country. Otherwise this lead another civil war for  decades..I appreciate your kind words ..After easter attack People lost thier faith on Muslims including both Sinhalesse and Tamil. So Muslims need to protect the country as well ..Otherwise they can leave Muslims countries where they can live religiously as they want..But destroying other monuments cant be accepted and it should be fined.

comments.comment:
Ara miniha ape Hamuduruwanta oluwatama paharadenna yanawa, nawathinne video recording dakala. Wahama police parikshana athyawasyai. Me kramema thama Burma wala karanneth jathyantharaya dala bangladesen elawano kallathoni burma walta ita passe jathiwadi kulawadi kia jathyantharen dala inna reporters UN walta yano, sampurnen me karanne Buddhagama seegrayen tharuna western ugathun ha samanya janaya athara walandaganima walakwanna genayana mudal dala karana vyaparayak. 
Apita videsikayinta sancharakayin awata kamak na oun itha thadin palanayak ona mokada ounge kotasak me pitupasath inno me sanharayata udauweno boru report karana jathyantareta.
Iraj Thank you Bro, be strong, great work, full self protection is a must. üí™üí™üí™üëà‚ù§üåπ
